Text:

Dear Mistarz,
Sorry but the file was downloaded properly.
There is no installer or explanation how to use these files. Just a A folder full of crap.
The idiot here is YOU! who posted this torrent TWICE! without knowing what to do.
Learn first how to post properly a torrent before opening your mouth.
Just wasting our time...
